name: The Silent Sound demo
description:
Welcome to "The Silent Sound," a thrilling story game where you will embark on an adventure with Yuki, a curious girl who discovers a mysterious piano sound from the forbidden forest. As she ventures deeper into the forest, she discovers a hidden secret guarded for centuries.

Yuki soon realizes that the piano sound is not just any ordinary sound but a clue to uncover the truth behind the disappearance of the boy she loves. With the help of clues and evidence scattered throughout the town, Yuki sets out on a mission to find the missing boy and uncover the secrets of the forbidden forest.

Throughout the game, you will explore the dark and eerie forest, interacting with different characters and creatures. You must solve puzzles and riddles to gather clues and evidence to help Yuki solve the mystery.

As you progress through the game, the story will unravel, revealing the secrets of the forbidden forest and the mysterious piano sound. You will encounter challenges and obstacles that will test your wit and problem-solving skills. But with your help, Yuki can solve the mystery and save the boy she loves.

Are you ready to join Yuki on her adventure and uncover the truth behind the piano sound and the forbidden forest? Play "The Silent Sound" now and embark on a thrilling journey of mystery and intrigue.

This is a demo version of the game that is currently in process. I'm open to opinions about the game.
